Invaders

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

The Invaders are those left behind from the other world after the cataclysm. A few of those left behind are sentient, able and willing to communicate. Though only a tiny fraction of those have anything but contempt and malice for their new neighbors. The vast majority of the beings left behind were either beasts before, have been warped by the cataclysm, or have been driven by pain and confusion to madness. Regardless- the environs of this far shore seems to have been radically different from Phoria. A large number of the Invaders seem far more adapted to dim aquatic and amphibious environs than their Phorian counterparts- allowing them to quickly dominate the watery parts of Phoria. Moreover, whether their own native world was simply a place of greater violence and struggle, those entities left behind by the cataclysm tend to be predatory, vicious, and efficient- few are known to be herbivorous and even among "plants" no known species does not prefer meat if allowed the chance.

As time has worn on many have noticed that many of the Invaders are drawn to the portals- and while much interest in this phenomenon has been generated among the human population of Phoria, no real answers have been gained.
